description: They include two students, a parent of a pupil and three of the killer's friends.
title: France teacher attack: Seven charged over Samuel Paty's killing
title_page: France teacher attack: Seven charged over Samuel Paty's killing - BBC News
maintext: A man named only as Brahim C, a parent of one of Mr Paty's pupils, is also under investigation. The 48-year-old is accused of orchestrating a hate campaign against Mr Paty and exchanging text messages with the killer before the attack.
